HCPCS Relative Value Units (RVUs)

Source: R/pfs.R
search_rvus.Rd

Physician Fee Schedule Relative Value File

Usage

search_rvus(hcpcs_code = NULL, type = c("amt", "ind"), ...)

Arguments

hcpcs_code

<chr> vector of 5-character HCPCS codes

type

<chr> part of RVU file to return; amt or ind

...

These dots are for future extensions and must be empty.

Value

a tibble

See also

Other Physician Fee Schedule Sources: search_anesthesia(), search_gpcis(), search_opps(), search_payment()

Examples

search_rvus(hcpcs_code = c("95907", "78140", "32820", "61575"))
#> # A tibble: 8 × 12
#>   hcpcs_code mod   rvu_work rvu_non_pe rvu_fac_pe rvu_mp rvu_non_sum rvu_fac_sum
#>   <chr>      <chr>    <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl>  <dbl>       <dbl>       <dbl>
#> 1 32820      NA       22.5       11.5       11.5    5.56       39.5        39.5 
#> 2 61575      NA       36.6       24.3       24.3   15.2        76.1        76.1 
#> 3 78140      NA        0.61       2.61       2.61   0.06        3.28        3.28
#> 4 78140      TC        0          2.51       2.51   0.05        2.56        2.56
#> 5 78140      26        0.61       0.1        0.1    0.01        0.72        0.72
#> 6 95907      NA        1          1.65       1.65   0.05        2.7         2.7 
#> 7 95907      TC        0          1.14       1.14   0.01        1.15        1.15
#> 8 95907      26        1          0.51       0.51   0.04        1.55        1.55
#> # ℹ 4 more variables: rvu_opps_non_pe <dbl>, rvu_opps_fac_pe <dbl>,
#> #   rvu_opps_mp <dbl>, cf <dbl>

search_rvus(hcpcs_code = "95907", type = "amt")
#> # A tibble: 3 × 12
#>   hcpcs_code mod   rvu_work rvu_non_pe rvu_fac_pe rvu_mp rvu_non_sum rvu_fac_sum
#>   <chr>      <chr>    <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl>  <dbl>       <dbl>       <dbl>
#> 1 95907      NA           1       1.65       1.65   0.05        2.7         2.7 
#> 2 95907      TC           0       1.14       1.14   0.01        1.15        1.15
#> 3 95907      26           1       0.51       0.51   0.04        1.55        1.55
#> # ℹ 4 more variables: rvu_opps_non_pe <dbl>, rvu_opps_fac_pe <dbl>,
#> #   rvu_opps_mp <dbl>, cf <dbl>

search_rvus(hcpcs_code = "95907", type = "ind")
#> # A tibble: 3 × 19
#>   hcpcs_code mod   status  pctc glob  pre_op intra_op post_op mult_proc
#>   <chr>      <chr> <chr>  <dbl> <chr>  <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 95907      NA    A          1 XXX        0        0       0         0
#> 2 95907      TC    A          1 XXX        0        0       0         0
#> 3 95907      26    A          1 XXX        0        0       0         0
#> # ℹ 10 more variables: bilat_surg <dbl>, asst_surg <dbl>, co_surg <dbl>,
#> #   team_surg <dbl>, endo_base <chr>, phys_diag_pro <chr>, diag_img_fam <chr>,
#> #   non_na <chr>, fac_na <chr>, not_used_mcr <chr>
